alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 7:28PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A group of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Prowers, northern Baca, central Kiowa and eastern Bent Counties through 815 PM MDT... At 727 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a group of strong thunderstorms across portions of western Prowers, northern Baca, central Kiowa and eastern Bent Counties, moving north at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... McClave around 740 PM MDT. Lamar and Wiley around 745 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Queens Reservoir, Neegronda Reservoir, Neeoshe Reservoir, Sweetwater Reservoir and Chivington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County; Western Kiowa County
